entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
